about me

Hey everyone, my name is Dylan. I lived in Costa Rica for 20 years before moving to Vancouver. I started developing websites in 8th grade, using tables and Frontpage.

I attended the Vancouver Art Institute, I graduated in 2008 with a two year technical degree in Advanced Web Development. At the time I planned on being a Flash developer as it was very high paying job at the time. The year I graduated Apple announced they would not support Flash, which crushed that dream.
